title: John Lobb
desc: A Magento e-commerce website for a luxury shoe brand.

title: Home Royale
desc: A luxury homeware store based in Lagos. The site is built on WordPress where the theme was built from scratch.

title: Somersby Cider
desc: A micro-site to showcase a new range of cider. The site is built with AngularJS and integrated with the Bazaarvoice product review system.

title: Crossway Foundation
desc: The Crossway Foundation is a London based charity delivering arts and education initiatives for young people across the UK and the Middle East.

title: Carlsberg People's Pundit
desc: A competition website for Carlsberg, allowing users to upload sound or video clips of themselves commentating a football match. The winner joined the Talksport on-air team at the Premier League final. The site was built using AngularJS, also utilising Howler JS for sound playback.

title: Danio The Grumbler
desc: A promotional micro-site offering a free giveaway of Danio yoghurts.

title: Katy's Cupcakes
desc: The website is used to showcase and drive business to a cupcake service based in Surrey.
